title: SPL Mini Games: World Post Day 2025 Interactive Experience

content.value: A suite of interactive mini-games and experiences designed to celebrate *World Post Day 2025*. This project highlights the diverse services of SPL (Saudi Post Logistics) through engaging challenges.

The application is built as a *Progressive Web App (PWA)*, ensuring accessibility across devices and offline capabilities. It features multiple distinct modules, each focusing on a different aspect of logistics and service.

content.caption: The 'Delivered Beyond Limits' module: A global service quiz challenging users' knowledge of international postal networks.

content.value: One of the key modules is the *Global Service Quiz*, where users test their knowledge about countries within the global postal service network. This module emphasizes SPL's extensive reach and international partnerships.

content.caption: The 'Delivered with Care' module: A sensitive shipment control panel for monitoring blood bags.

content.value: Another critical component is the *Sensitive Shipments Control Panel*. This simulation demonstrates the precision and care required in medical logistics. Users monitor *temperature ranges* and *delivery times* for blood bags, ensuring they stay within safe limits.

The project also includes modules for *Packaging* and *Collage* creation, offering a varied experience that combines education with entertainment. The entire application supports *bilingual content (Arabic and English)* to reach a wider audience.

shortDescription: A collection of interactive mini-games for World Post Day 2025, featuring logistics challenges and educational quizzes.
metaDescription: Explore SPL Mini Games: An interactive PWA celebrating World Post Day 2025 with challenges on global logistics, sensitive shipments, and more.
objectives: Celebrate World Post Day 2025 with an engaging digital experience.
Educate users on the complexity and care involved in logistics.
Highlight SPL's global reach and specialized services.
Provide a portable, offline-ready application for events.

functionality.description: Centralized interface to access Blood, World, Collage, and Packaging games.
Full support for Arabic (RTL) and English (LTR) across all modules.
Real-time monitoring simulation for sensitive shipments (temperature, time).
Fully functional offline mode using Service Workers and PWA standards.

outcomes: Delivered a robust, portable interactive experience for event use.
Successfully gamified complex logistics concepts for general audiences.
Ensured seamless operation across various devices without installation.
notes: Designed to be run from a flash drive or local server without complex installation.
